name: YOU ARE A WIZARD
description:
YOU ARE A WIZARD is a Commodore 64-esque fever dream about one of those wizards you see airbrushed on the sides of vans. 

You are that wizard.

  • Do spells
  • Solve riddles
  • Talk through your feelings
  • Explore the MYSTICAL FOREST
  • Collect magic orbs
  • Enjoy a fully a capella soundtrack
  • Debate the nature of reality
  • Look for your boyfriend, Sherlock Holmes

Session time: roughly 30 minutes
Content warnings: death mention, illness mention, some fuck words
